summary: This is a brief email correspondence from June 25, 2021, requesting the creation of new testifying witness folders for the Epstein case and the saving of attached documents. It appears to be internal administrative communication related to witness management.
keyFacts: Internal communication dated June 25, 2021, regarding the Epstein case.
Request to create new testifying witness folders for the Epstein share.
Instructions to save attached documents (20210624 233332.PDF and notes -_Vol.pdf) in those folders.
Suggests ongoing witness preparation or management activities in 2021.
Document is administrative in nature, focusing on file organization for witnesses.
